clinical_study.brief_title: A Study on the Prospective Cohort Library of COVID-19 in Southeran
clinical_study.official_title: A Study on the Prospective Cohort Library of Novel Coronavirus Pneumonia in Southeran

lead_sponsor.agency: Second Affiliated Hospital of Wenzhou Medical University

collaborator.agency: First Affiliated Hospital of Wenzhou Medical University
Wenzhou Central Hospital And Sixth People's Hospital of Wenzhou Medical University
Yueqing Hospital of Wenzhou Medical University
Ruian Hospital of Wenzhou Medical University
Cangnan Hospital of Wenzhou Medical University
Pingyang Hospital of Wenzhou Medical University

clinical_study.source: Second Affiliated Hospital of Wenzhou Medical University

brief_summary.textblock: This is a multi-centre population-based follow-up study for all 504 patients with laboratory-confirmed COVID-19. This study establishes a standardized and structured clinical database to provide complete and multidimensional clinical diagnosis and treatment data of novel coronavirus pneumonia, which also support future epidemiological, infectious disease study and patients' prognosis, by collecting clinical data and the related data of patients with novel coronavirus pneumonia in Southern Zhejiang province.

detailed_description.textblock: The follow-up information will be collected in one-month, three-month, six-month and one-year after discharge. Information about symptoms, radiographic and laboratory findings, lung function, SF-36 QUESTIONNAIRE, antibody of COVID19ï¼Œresult of RT-PCR Test and suvival information will be collected through all time frames.

primary_outcome.time_frame: one month, three month, six month and one year after discharge, minimum score
primary_outcome.description: sum score of SF 36 form in each time frame

primary_outcome.measure: the value of FEV1 by lung function test
primary_outcome.time_frame: one month, three month, six month and one year after discharge

primary_outcome.measure: the ratio of FEV1 to FVC by lung function test
primary_outcome.time_frame: one month, three month, six month and one year after discharge

secondary_outcome.measure: the predicted value of FEV1 by lung function test
secondary_outcome.time_frame: one month, three month, six month and one year after discharge

secondary_outcome.measure: the predicted ratio of FEV1 to FVC by lung function test
secondary_outcome.time_frame: one month, three month, six month and one year after discharge
one month, three month, six month and one year after discharge
one month, three month, six month and one year after discharge
one month, three month, six month and one year after discharge

secondary_outcome.measure: the proportion of applying ACEIs/ARBs medication
secondary_outcome.time_frame: from the date of hospital admission to the day of hospital discharge
secondary_outcome.description: collect the number of applying ACEIs/ARBs medication and calculate the proportion

secondary_outcome.measure: number of clinical symptoms after hospital discharge
secondary_outcome.time_frame: one month, three month, six month and one year after discharge

secondary_outcome.measure: number of cases returning to positive result in RT-PCR test
secondary_outcome.time_frame: one month, three month, six month and one year after discharge

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of positive outcome of IgG for antibody of COVID-19
secondary_outcome.time_frame: one month, three month, six month and one year after discharge

study_pop.textblock: Among all 504 patients with laboratory-confirmed COVID-19, 190 patients were classified as the imported cohort, and 311 patients were classified into the secondary cohort, three patients were excluded. The patients' inclusion cutoff was March 15, 2020.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- All patients with laboratory-confirmed COVID-19 in Wenzhou
Exclusion Criteria:
- Suspected cases of COVID-19

facility.name: The Second Affiliated Hospital and Yuying Children's Hospital of Wenzhou Medical University
